contentrichtext.text: POV rant page by [[Wikipedia:Requests for comment/Paul Vogel|Paul Vogel]]. Is there even such an organisation? - [[User:David Gerard|David Gerard]] 21:33, Apr 2, 2004 (UTC) *Lean towards keeping newly written stub. Over 1000 hits for ''"World Pantheist Movement"''. [[User:Niteowlneils|Niteowlneils]] 21:51, 2 Apr 2004 (UTC) *I got 2150. Keep stub. [[User:Meelar|Meelar]] 02:28, 3 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Newly written stub is good. Now the hard part is how to keep Vogel from reverting it to the incoherent POV rant several times a day ... - [[User:David Gerard|David Gerard]] 15:14, Apr 5, 2004 (UTC) **Delete Vogel? -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 02:55, Apr 6, 2004 (UTC) ***See [[Wikipedia talk:Quickpolls]] for discussion of the 3-revert rule and anons - [[User:David Gerard|David Gerard]] 07:32, Apr 6, 2004 (UTC)
